text: Alberto Vaquina (born July 4, 1961) is a Mozambican politician. He was Prime Minister of Mozambique from 2012 to 2015. He was appointed by President Armando Guebuza on 8 October 2012, replacing Aires Ali. Vaquina was Governor of Tete Province from 2010 to 2012."Guebuza's new man", Africa Confidential, volume 53, number 21, 19 October 2012. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Mozambique
title: Alberto Vaquina
